titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the career and work of Justice C. Clifton Young.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 107-582.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 194.

action.text: Mr. Sensenbrenner moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 417.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/16/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Honors the dedication and commitment of Justice C. Clifton Young to the people of Nevada and the United States.Congratulates Justice Young on his long and successful career and expresses best wishes to him upon his retirement from the Nevada Supreme Court.
